name: Tidy Tabs!
description: An organizer of tabs & tab groups

new_tab_in_selected_group.description: Opens a new tab in the same group as the active tab.

new_tab_in_new_group.description: Opens a new tab in a new group

sort_highlighted_tabs.description: Sorts the highlighted tabs.  This only affects tabs meeting a sorting criteria.

sort_all_tabs.description: Sorts all tabs.  This only affects tabs meeting a sorting criteria.

collapse_all_groups_in_window.description: Collapse all open groups in the active tab's window.

collapse_all_groups.description: Collapse all open groups in all windows.

sweep_groups_to_beginning.description: Move all groups in current window to the beginning of the tab order.

sweep_groups_to_end.description: Move all groups in current window to the end of the tab order.
